root: ^Yeah, I know. The boss already lectured me on it

IKnow: ^About your attire no doubt. you look like a good for nothing slacker.
^A word of advice, don't take laidback co-worker's fashion tips or you'll both look like high school drop-outs.
^The boss definitely won't tollerate that at the company but no, I mean something else.
What: ^Your looks. You haven’t cleaned up your looks. Moping around, slouching…
^... you’re not still over it yet, are you?
Oblivious: ^Running away on your big day like a coward.
^Have you even talked to her after that whole thing? You really need to start pulling your act together
^What does that have to do with how I look?
HowDoYouForget: ^How do you just forget like that? You're so disrespectful.
^I am over it. I can handle myself.
IAm: ^Sure, because showing up late dressed like a drunk is a fool proof sign that you're over it.
WhyDoesItMatter: ^Yes it matters! This is how you carry yourself. It's a reflection of how you present yourself to the world, have you no pride?
^Whatever. I don't have time for this
ConcernTwo: ^Clearly. Its been forever, you can’t be moping around. It's affecting your performance
^I didn't come here to be lectured.
Concerned: ^Because not only are you setting a bad example for this company, I just can't wrap my head around how you can live with yourself without a care in the world after what you did. You're a grown man, Matt, you need to take responsibility for once in your life and actually act like it.
Fantasy: ^Matt, life is hard but people never got anything done dragging their heels in the dirt, you need to snap yourself out of this made-up fantasy and face reality
^the world does not revolve around you
Thoughts: ^Well it’s time you should. This is how you’re making the world view you. Get your act together.
